sentence: Bill sponsor Sen. Theresa Gavarone, a Bowling Green Republican, researched the legislation after learning of the experience of Noor Abukaram, a runner at Sylvania Northview in suburban Toledo who was disqualified over her hijab in 2019.
author: Associated Press
title: Ohio governor signs athletes' religious expression bill

sentence: Bill sponsor Sen. Theresa Gavarone, a Bowling Green Republican, researched the legislation after learning of the experience of Noor Abukaram, a runner at Sylvania Northview in suburban Toledo who was disqualified over her hijab in 2019.
title: Ohio Governor Signs Athletes' Religious Expression Bill

sentence: And not long after that, her plight caught the attention of state Sen. Theresa Gavarone, a Bowling Green Republican outraged at the girl's treatment.
title: Religious Runner Exalts in Victory on Athletes' Expression

title: Faith or sports: Ohio law ensures athletes don't have to choose

sentence: The legislation, sponsored by Sen. Theresa Gavarone, R-Huron, is similar to current Ohio law where felony levels are increased for drug trafficking near schools or juveniles.
author: Titus Wu
title: Ohio could soon increase penalties for drug dealing near treatment sites
